text:
Company: Flores LLC

Job Title: Senior Help Desk Representative

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Help Desk Representative to join our team at Flores LLC. As a Senior Help Desk Representative, you will be responsible for providing top-notch technical support to our clients, troubleshooting complex technical issues, and ensuring timely resolutions.

Responsibilities:

- Respond to client inquiries via phone, email, and chat
- Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in a timely and professional manner
- Collaborate with internal teams to resolve complex technical issues
- Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies

Qualifications:

- 3+ years of experience in a help desk or technical support role
- Strong technical knowledge of computer hardware, software, and networks
- Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
